mapper.select: SELECT e.* FROM `${table}` e WHERE (e.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')) AND e.`object_id` = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT p.`object_id` FROM `person` p JOIN `person_attribute` pa ON (pa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND pa.`attribute_type_id` = #{registrationAttributeType} AND pa.`object_id` = p.`object_id`) JOIN `registration` reg ON (reg.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND reg.`object_id` = pa.`value_id`) JOIN `registration_attribute` address ON (address.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND address.`object_id` = reg.`object_id` AND address.`attribute_type_id` = #{addressAttributeType}) WHERE p.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND address.`value_id` = #{addressId} AND address.`value_type_id` = #{addressTypeId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.`object_id` FROM `person` p JOIN `person_attribute` pa ON (pa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND pa.`attribute_type_id` = #{registrationAttributeType} AND pa.`object_id` = p.`object_id`) JOIN `registration` reg ON (reg.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND reg.`object_id` = pa.`value_id`) JOIN `registration_attribute` address ON (address.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND address.`object_id` = reg.`object_id` AND address.`attribute_type_id` = #{addressAttributeType}) JOIN `registration_attribute` isOwner ON (isOwner.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND isOwner.`object_id` = reg.`object_id` AND isOwner.`attribute_type_id` = #{isOwnerAttributeType}) WHERE p.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND address.`value_id` = #{addressId} AND address.`value_type_id` = #{addressTypeId}
